title: Review tool execute signatures and storage APIs
description:
Manually review key Mastra API usage patterns after codemod and package update.

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade-spec.md`

**Files to review:**

1. **Tool signature** - `src/mastra/tools/weather-tool.ts`
   - Verify `execute` uses `(inputData, context)` pattern (not just `inputData`)

2. **Mastra instance** - `src/mastra/index.ts`
   - Verify PostgresStore configuration is compatible
   - Check logger configuration

3. **Workflow storage** - `app/chat-survey/actions.ts`
   - Verify `storage.getStore()` still works
   - Verify `store.loadWorkflowSnapshot()` still works
   - Check workflow.run() and workflow.resume() signatures

4. **Agent files** - Check a sample of agents for:
   - No deprecated `format` parameter in generate() calls
   - Imports use subpath patterns

**If any issues found:**
- Fix them directly
- Document what was fixed

⚠️ Do not close until all files reviewed and any issues fixed.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes; grep -r 'format:' src/mastra/agents/ returns no matches for deprecated format param
closed_reason: Reviewed: All Mastra v1 APIs compatible. Tool execute uses inputData-only pattern (valid), PostgresStore and PinoLogger configs correct, workflow storage APIs (getStore, loadWorkflowSnapshot) working, no deprecated format param in agents, tsc passes
